# parent(of:)

**Instance Method**

Finds the parent item of the specified item in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func parent(of child: ItemIdentifierType) -> ItemIdentifierType?
```

## Getting item metrics

- **index(of:)**: Finds the index of the specified item in the section snapshot.
- **level(of:)**: Finds the hierarchical level of the specified item in the section snapshot.
- **contains(_:)**: Indicates whether the section snapshot contains the specified item.
- **isVisible(_:)**: Indicates whether the specified item is currently visible onscreen.

items.description: Finds the index of the specified item in the section snapshot.
